languages.text: "Враги Человечества наносят удар за ударом, пользуясь нашим промедлением". {n}Арджента вскидывает голову, ее глаза пылают.{/n} "Мне не терпится напомнить каждому из них, что праведные зрят их преступления — за каждое будет воздано!"

"The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"
languages.original_text: "Враги Человечества наносят удар за ударом, пользуясь нашим промедлением". {n}Арджента вскидывает голову, ее глаза пылают.{/n} "Мне не терпится напомнить каждому из них, что праведные зрят их преступления — за каждое будет воздано!"

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity are dealing us blow after blow, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity are dealing us blow after blow, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"

traits.locale_text: "The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “由于我们的优柔寡断，人类之敌正在大肆袭击我们。”{n}阿洁塔抬起头，目光仿佛在燃烧一般。{/n}“我要提醒他们每个人，他们绝对不会逃过正义的凝视！他们犯下的每一条罪行，都必定会受到惩罚！”
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"

traits.locale_text: “由于我们的优柔寡断，人类之敌正在大肆袭击我们。”{n}阿洁塔抬起头，目光仿佛在燃烧一般。{/n}“我要提醒他们每个人，他们绝对不会逃过正义的凝视！他们犯下的每一条罪行，都必定会受到惩罚！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Feinde der Menschheit lassen Hiebe auf uns herabregnen, sie nutzen unsere Unentschlossenheit aus." {n}Argenta reißt ruckartig den Kopf hoch. Ihre Augen brennen.{/n} "Ich möchte sie alle daran erinnern, dass ihre Verbrechen den Augen der Rechtschaffenen nicht verborgen geblieben sind — und dass es Vergeltung für jedes einzelne dieser Verbrechen geben wird!"
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Feinde der Menschheit lassen Hiebe auf uns herabregnen, sie nutzen unsere Unentschlossenheit aus." {n}Argenta reißt ruckartig den Kopf hoch. Ihre Augen brennen.{/n} "Ich möchte sie alle daran erinnern, dass ihre Verbrechen den Augen der Rechtschaffenen nicht verborgen geblieben sind — und dass es Vergeltung für jedes einzelne dieser Verbrechen geben wird!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad aprovechan nuestra indecisión para asestarnos una lluvia de golpes». {n}Argenta levanta bruscamente la cabeza; tiene los ojos encendidos.{/n} «Les instaré a recordar que sus crímenes no han pasado inadvertidos a ojos de los píos. ¡Pagarán con creces todas y cada una de sus afrentas!».
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"

traits.locale_text: «Los enemigos de la Humanidad aprovechan nuestra indecisión para asestarnos una lluvia de golpes». {n}Argenta levanta bruscamente la cabeza; tiene los ojos encendidos.{/n} «Les instaré a recordar que sus crímenes no han pasado inadvertidos a ojos de los píos. ¡Pagarán con creces todas y cada una de sus afrentas!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta relève brusquement la tête, le regard plein de détermination.{/n} « Les ennemis de l'humanité nous rouent de coups en misant sur notre hésitation. Je tiens à leur rappeler à tous que leurs crimes n'ont pas échappé aux vertueux et qu'ils paieront pour chacun d'entre eux ! »
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta relève brusquement la tête, le regard plein de détermination.{/n} « Les ennemis de l'humanité nous rouent de coups en misant sur notre hésitation. Je tiens à leur rappeler à tous que leurs crimes n'ont pas échappé aux vertueux et qu'ils paieront pour chacun d'entre eux ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「人類の敵は、私たちの優柔不断さにつけこんで、私たちに攻撃を浴びせている」{n}アルジェンタは頭をグイッと上げ、その瞳は燃えている。{/n}「急いで彼らの罪が正義の目を逃れていないことを、彼ら一人一人に思い出させるとしよう。そして、それぞれの罪には報いがあるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"

traits.locale_text: 「人類の敵は、私たちの優柔不断さにつけこんで、私たちに攻撃を浴びせている」{n}アルジェンタは頭をグイッと上げ、その瞳は燃えている。{/n}「急いで彼らの罪が正義の目を逃れていないことを、彼ら一人一人に思い出させるとしよう。そして、それぞれの罪には報いがあるだろう！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "İnsanlığın düşmanları bize darbe üzerine darbe vuruyor, kararsızlığımızdan yararlanıyor." {n}Başını kaldıran Argenta'nın gözleri, alev alev yanıyor.{/n} "İşledikleri suçların, haklı olanların gözünden kaçmadığını ve bu suçların her birinin intikamının alınacağını onlara hatırlatacağım!"
languages.original_text: "The enemies of Humanity are showering us with blows, capitalising on our indecision." {n}Argenta jerks her head up, her eyes aflame.{/n} "I hasten to remind every one of them that their crimes have not escaped the eyes of the righteous — and there will be retribution for each of those crimes!"

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığın Düşmanları üzerimize darbeler yağdırıyor, kararsızlığımızdan yararlanıyor." {n}Argenta başını kaldırıyor, gözleri alevli alevli bakıyor.{/n} "İşledikleri suçların, haklı olanların gözünden kaçmadığını ve bu suçların her birinin intikamının alınacağını onlara hatırlatmakta gecikmiyorum!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
